title: IPartialEdgeFilletData.AlongEdgeDirection
description: Gets which end of the edge to start the fillet.
returns: True to start the fillet at the start point of the edge, false to start the fillet at the end point of the edge
remarks:
To modify the starting point of the fillet after creation, you must call
IPartialEdgeFilletData::SetPartialFilletParameters
.
